content: This one closes #3097. It's a small PR and doesn't come with any trade-offs. Should be easy to review :+1:
With this, we're getting to the stage where squeeze_simp works 100% of the time. It would be interesting if people can still find instances when it fails.
I'm curious to see what might come up after this and Eric's PR get merged :eyes:

I'd just suggest briefly explaining in the commit message

@Kyle Miller @Rob Lewis sorry I thought that comment was about a literal commit message so I force pushed a commit explaining that. But I noticed that I was supposed to explain it in the PR description, which would become the final commit message (thanks ). I'm gonna follow that practice in the next PRs :+1:
